14281.そのカテゴリのレシピは\nまだ 覚えていません。<end>:
You don't know any recipes of this category
yet.<end>

14282.さいほう設備がある。\nさいほう職人であれば\nここで アイテムが作れそうだ。:
It's a sewing facility. If you're a sewer, you
can craft items here.

14284.さいほう設備がある。\nさいほう針があれば\nここで さいほうが できそうだ。:
It's a sewing facility.
If you have a sewing needle, you can do sewing
here.

There is not enough material to make

24608.<%sL_RECIPE>を 作るには\n<pc>の さいほう職人レベルが\n<%:
To create <%sL_RECIPE>, the Sewer level of
<pc> must be at least
<%dL_HITUYOU_LV>.<end>

24635.さいほう設備がある。\nさいほうの レシピを覚えれば\nここで さいほうが でき:
It's a sewing facility. If you learn some
sewing recipes, they can be crafted here.

24670.<%sL_RECIPE>のレシピは\nまだ 覚えていません。<end>:
You don't know the <%sL_RECIPE>
recipe yet.<end>

25859.作る物の種類を 選んでください。\n<break>:
Please select what you'd like to craft.
<break>

25860.現在 さいほう職人レベル<%dL_SYOKUNIN_LV>です。\n何を作ります:
Currently at Sewing level <%dL_SYOKUNIN_LV>.
What do you make?<break>

30136.さいほうとは 素材となる布を ぬいあわせて\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\:
The sewing is the process of sewing the fabric together to make the desired item. The quality of the finished product is determined by the
accuracy of this process. Concentration is required to execute the commands. If you lose concentration, you will not be able to execute
the commands. The stronger the power of the plucking, the greater the plucking accuracy, but the plucking power changes each time.
Adjust the power according to the change in power. Please note that if the game is interrupted during sewing due to a
communication error, all materials will be lost.

31438.ヨコぬいを使うと\n左右に２マス分 まとめてぬいつけます。:
Using the horizontal stitching method, two
squares on each side can be sewn together.

31504.かげんぬいを使うと\n半分のチカラで ぬいつけることができます。\n細かい調整を:
Using a "kanjen-nui", you can plaster with
only half the force. This is useful when you
want to make fine adjustments!

31506.糸ほぐしを使うと\nぬいすぎた１マスを ほぐして\nゆるめることができます。:
A thread remover can be used to loosen a
square that has been over-stitched.

31512.水平ぬいを使うと\nヨコ１列を 一気にぬいつけます。:
Horizontal stitching allows you to stitch a
row or column at a time.

31513.滝のぼりを使うと\n上下に２マス分 まとめてぬいつけます。:
The waterfall can be used to wet two squares
at a time, up and down.

31514.玉どめを使ったマスは\nしばらくの間 何をしても\nぬいつけられなくなります。:
A square with a thread knot cannot be sewn
for a short while.

31515.たすきぬいを使うと 左下から右上に向かって\nナナメに２マス分 まとめてぬいつけ:
Using Cross-stitch, you can sew two
squares diagonally starting from the bottom left
and going to the upper right.

31517.直角ぬいを使うと\nＬの字に３マス分 まとめてぬいつけます。:
Using a right-angle brush, you can stitch
three squares in a row in the shape of the
letter "L".

31537.２倍ぬいを使うと\nひとつのマスを ２倍の強さで ぬいつけます。\nぬいパワーと:
With Double Nui, you can double the strength
of a single square. Use it in combination with
Nui Power!

31538.うでまくりをすると 次にぬう時に\nチカラが１.５倍になり 会心率も上がります。:
When you do the "Ude-Maki", your strength will be increased by 1.5 times and your critical rate will also increase. It is effective when
used in combination with other skills!

32993.大滝のぼりを使うと\nタテ１列を 一気にぬいつけます。:
The Otaki Nobori can be used to sweep a
vertical line at a time.

32994.精神統一をすると その時のぬいパワーを\n３ターンの間 持続させることができます:
When you perform a mental unification, your
Nui Power lasts for 3 turns.

38994.さいほうの遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\nカットされた布を ぬいあわせて\n成:
Here is an explanation of how to play "sewing". When all the squares are aligned with the success line, press the "Finish"
command to complete! The strength of each stitch changes with each stitch. Be careful of the change of the plucking power and the
remaining concentration power to complete the puzzle!

41475.会心0.1％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.1％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.1% permanently!

41476.会心0.2％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.2％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.2% permanently!

41477.会心0.3％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.3％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.3% permanently!

41478.会心0.3％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.3％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.3% permanently!

41479.会心0.5％アップは\n覚えているだけで 常に会心率が\n0.5％分 上がるよう:
Your chance of scoring a critical hit has
increased by 0.5% permanently!

41480.ねらいぬいを使うと\nとぎすました 会心率の高い\nひとぬいをします！:
When you use the Aiming Stitch, he'll make a
clean, precise stitch with a high accuracy
rate!

41525.<%sL_RECIPE>は\n『いっぱつしあげ』が できます。\n<select:
<%sL_RECIPE> can be quick crafted.
<select>
Craft Normally
Quick Craft
<select_end><break>

44564.一度 コツをつかんだ アイテムは\n『いっぱつしあげ』が できるようになります。:
Once you have a knack for an item, the "Quick Craft" command becomes available.
Quick Craft allows you to finish the item in no time flat! However, items created this way can never be ★★★ quality.
In addition, the chance of getting a critical hit while using "Craft Normally" has increased slightly!

45133.<%sL_RECIPE>は\n『いっぱつしあげ』が できます。\n<select:
<%sL_RECIPE> can be quick crafted.
<select 2>
Craft Normally
Quick Craft
<select_end><break>

45621.逆たすきぬいを使うと 右下から左上に向かって\nナナメに２マス分 まとめてぬいつ:
Using reverse tsuki-nui, two squares can be
tucked together from the lower right corner to
the upper left corner.

53898.３倍ぬいを使うと\nひとつのマスを ３倍の強さで ぬいつけます。\nぬいパワーと:
With 3x Nudo, you can triple the strength of a
single square. Use it in combination with Nui
Power!

55904.大成功品は できませんが\nいっぱつしあげをして よろしいですか？\n<yesn:
You can't get a Perfection with a quick
craft. Do you still want to do it?
<yesno><close>

67334.レシピを 覚えていないため\n<%sL_SEISAN_MENU>を作ることが で:

67648.ぬいパワーシフトをすると ぬいパワーを\nランダムで変化させることができます。\:
By using Shift Sew, you can randomly change
the power of your sewing. Use it when you
need to change your sewing power!

103183.<color_yellow>\n「どうぐかばん」だけでなく 「預かり所」と\n「:
You can now sew using not only the item bag, but also the materials in the Depository and Roof Storage! If you
select a recipe that does not have the necessary materials, you can use the material items in the "Depository" and "Roof Storage".

113263.しつけがけを使ったマスは\n次にぬう時に ２倍の強さで ぬいつけられます。\n他:
Squares that have been painted with the "brush and paint" technique will be painted twice as hard the next time they are painted. It is
effective when used in combination with other skills!

119116.<speed=0>\n<pc>は いま作っている\n<%sL_RECIPE>を:

143090.巻きこみぬいを使うと\nひとつのマスを 強いチカラで ぬいつけます。\nさらに:
With the Makikomi Nuri, a single square is
plunged with strong force. The next square is
then plucked with less force.

178608.今週の職人回数が 上限に達したので\nこれ以上 さいほうはできません。\n<br:
We have reached our sewing limit for the week, so no more sewing will be available. Sewing will be available again on Sunday mornings
after 6:00 a.m.
